body:
Thanks @carpodaster and @klappradla!!! Look at how much better it is now!!
I really love the `to_s`, and all the changes were super easy to implement because of all the other changes in the beginning of the PR. Even in the specs!! 
I couldn't find a better way for the [postponed return statement  ](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/748/files#diff-56e7f37be264728c800fc00646920fb7R20). At least not without either repeating the 'elements' or move the 'same day'-check to the end of the method in a ternary.
